title: DirectX Error
body:
After champ select the game will not load and instead a message will appear 'An unknown DirectX error has occurred and league of legends cannot start. please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the manufacturer'.

And then I can't enter the game and the only fix to this problem is restarting my PC.
I have tried repairing the game, reinstalling the game, updating my computer (windows updates), turning off firewalls, running Anti-Virus scans, playing with low settings, playing in windowed mode, updating my DirectX (which is up to date) and updating my graphics driver (which is also up to date). Again the only thing that works is restarting my PC, and then the game will run normally for 3-4 hours before the same problem occurs again. Please help.

replies.body: Just started getting this problem today.. I have had it before and it just ended up fixing itself. But not this time.
I'm getting this exact same problem, haven't found anything to fix it yet :s
